thread.title: Joe W from Boston
thread.title_full: Gym Source reviewed by Joe W from Boston

author: Joe W from Boston
title: Joe W from Boston
text:
I was in a bit of a hurry to get a treadmill picked out, delivered and set up.
My rep at Gym Source was very knowledgable and thoughtful in his approach and all communications.
We had some bumps with a delivery due to snow and dates, but he kept me informed and in the loop.
The product has met expectations and the service and "going above and beyond" to make sure I was happy was very evident from the crew in the Nashua store.
The delivery team was very thorough and neat, wiped feet, set up area was spotless.
Highly recommend this store and staff to anyone looking to make a purchase.
